name: Senior Frontend Engineer
description:
ABOUT KIKO

At Kiko we dream big, and aim higher. We love what we do and always put the team first. We deliver our work fast and always make a big impact. That's how we've become one of the fastest-growing Proptech startups in Europe to disrupt the $10,000,000,000,000 (yes, we mean ten trillion dollars) real estate industry.

Kiko was founded by Valentin Scholz and Tony Popov, two early employees of Revolut that fixed and disrupted banking and crypto with the the fastest growing Unicorns in Europe. The remaining team worked at Yandex, Blockchain.com and J.P. Morgan before.

Kiko is backed by Seedcamp and some of the finest VCs in the European startup scene.

HOW TO CHAMPION FRONTEND AT KIKO

  • You love building pixel-perfect and elegant web applications
  • You have 2+ years of experience working in a fast paced startup
  • You have 3+ years working with JavaScript, ReactJS and Typescript building modern web (or mobile) applications
  • You share our passion: improve the standard of living.
  • You own your work: review mockups, create data requirements, implement screens, QA and deploy
  • You always put the team first and help whenever needed. We win and lose together.
  • You love to collaborate with other departments, incl. senior management, product managers, designers and operations to build innovative and exciting products
  • You love shipping features quickly while keeping your code clean
  • You are passionate about your work and you strive for excellence

THE REWARD

  • Join one of the fastest-growing Proptech companies in Europe (backed by Seedcamp)
  • Worked with an extremely passionate and skilled team that previously had key roles at Revolut, Yandex and Blockchain.com
  • Compensation: Up to $48,000 (+ equity)
  • Equity performance bonuses twice a year
  • See the impact of your work immediately
  • Remote work possible
  • We have only greenfield projects: define the rules and own architecture
  • International team that's based in London, Germany and Moscow. Ideal to improve your English

ROLE DETAILS

  • Role is permanent: you will drive our development and grow with us
  • Formally it's a contractor position in Moscow, HQ is in London (remote work possible)
  • Salary is gross, you'll have to pay ~7% sole entrepreneur taxes
  • Latest MacBook Pro, and the equipment you require
